application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: St Charles Centre for Health and Wellbeing, St Charles Hospital, Exmoor Street, LONDON, W10 6DZ
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - d) air conditioning units - internal and external, including details of noise attenuating housing and location proposed) of Listed Building consent LB/22/04451 (Refurbishment and maintenance works to unused space to create a new staff room to rooms 00/184 and 00/185 including renewal of roof covering, external maintenance and repairs of windows and brickwork, renewal of roof level air conditioning units and internal refurbishment to provide kitchenette and seating areas)
